Password requirements for LastPass

A visual helper for the 5 requirements needed for a LastPass master password on their website and mobile apps.

Original Reference Report Issue

Requirements

Must be at least 12 characters long

Must use upper case letters, lower case letters, numbers, and special characters

Additional Info

Master passcodes that were previously used on your account may be flagged when resetting the master password.
